edited_stories.edited_story_text: Outside a building hung a sign. Worn and crooked, and brimming with character. Walking past the doorway led to a room that was tidy and rather quaint. A staircase was at the center of the building, which led up to a well furnished lounge. Next to it was the bedroom. It was quite nice with a mattress enticing those that rummage about to nap in it.
